passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)

html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(4) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > footer > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(5) > h3:nth-child(1)
